评论概述: Great quality, but not enough for the price
评论详情: I love the look and feel of these compared to Cunno who offers 120 for in the $50s. I was really hoping to like Cunnos since they sold so much in bulk, but they are wrinkled and shedding on the ties compared to these. Cunnos is shown in picture 2. It has a much more porous surface whereas these are softer. They are both difficult to tie, and I am considering sending them all back and getting the ones with the tuck in flap instead because of it. It honestly took me a couple minutes to tie them the way I want it to look and that alone made me feel like it's time to go back to grade school to learn how to tie properly! If Lothee sold the same amount as Cunno does for the same price I would definitely keep these, but knowing there are so many variable prices with different amounts makes it a hard decision.

I am a metalsmith and jeweler, always looking for inexpensive (cheap) ways to package or present my pieces that look classier and more expensive than they are. I have a stamp of my logo that I use on these sweet little pouches that make them look custom made. Customers always comment how “fancy” they are. Price is right and they look great. Order them.

I bought these for shower favors and punched a few holes inside to hold two pairs of earrings. The material feels like real suede, and using a pin is easy to poke a few holes so it can securely hold earrings plus a few bracelets or necklaces inside the pouch. It’s all I would need for a weekend getaway! It looks like the multi pack comes with four colors, but it was a light tan/ivory, pink and dark tan. There were the most quantity of the dark tan in the set.

评论概述: Cute Beige Microfiber Jewelry Pouches with Bow Ties
评论详情: I added these beige microfiber jewelry pouches with bow ties to my online store's packaging, and I'm absolutely delighted with them! They offer such an elegant and sophisticated touch to every piece of jewelry I ship out. The beige color is neutral yet chic, making it a perfect match for a variety of jewelry styles, from classic to contemporary.  The microfiber material feels luxurious and does a fantastic job of protecting the jewelry inside. It's soft enough to prevent scratches on delicate pieces, which is essential for maintaining the high quality of the items I sell. The size of the pouches is just right, accommodating a range of jewelry sizes without being too bulky or too small.  What really sets these pouches apart, though, is the adorable bow tie detail. It adds a cute, personal touch that my customers have noted and appreciated. I highly recommend them to anyone looking to elevate their jewelry packaging in an online retail setting.

I use these to package my jewelry orders but I've always ordered from a different seller which took much longer to arrive. These arrived within days and the quality is very good. I purchased the multicolor pack which has four different colors, pink, khaki, brown and grey. The pink is not a bright pink it's soft dusty pink, the khaki color is more like a cognac color, the brown color is a true rich brown and the grey color looks nothing like grey. I thought it was close to a cream color or maybe a very, very, very light grey color. The product itself is well made and the quality is very good. 2/18/23.
